div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxiiijo die aprilis anno
quo supra

The said' day the ballieis continevit the decisione of theo borghe' and Recovntir betuix Johne
Cullane and William scherar' litstar quhile monunday that next cumis for waknes of the
Court

The said' day the balyeis assignt monunday that next cumis to thome straloche tile ansuer
to the borghe' fundin one him be gilbert tulidef for Richerd redhed' for the wranguis' haldin fra him of
ane boll of quhet et cetera

The saide day the balyeis assignit monunday that next cumis to the Relict of William
Coupar to preiwe that george talyour hed' castyn' elding in hyr' myr' et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem vicesimo Sexto die
mensis aprilis Anno quo supra

add.foreign: aquitans Alexandri Red' de girssuma demi' nethis de Done

div.p:
The said' day the aldirman and ballieis grauntit that Alexander Red' at commavnd'
of thame and the Counsale hed' pait fourty Schillingis to sere thomas bynne
tuenty Schillingis to the Relict of vmquhile Robert huchonsone sangstar
for the Releving and redeming of thar lettres vndir the common' Sele for his girssom'
of his half nethis fischingis of wyne Sett to him for the ter termes of fiwe
yeris

Eodem die Dauid meneyeis deuenit plegius legalis per manus sue ostendem quod Dauid
ruthirfurd' erit Indempnes pro Johanne ruthirfurde milite aliter quam per viam Juris
Et Alexander Rede deuenit plegius legalis per manus sue ostendem quod dictus
miles erit Indempnis pro prefato Dauid aliter quam per viam Juris Et dicte
partes obligantur ad conseruandum suos plegios Indempnes de huiusmodi fideiussione

Curia balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem quarto die mensis maij
Anno Dominj millesimo quingentesimo sexto

The said day the breive of Inquest Impetrat be Williame forbes of towijs
being continewit obefor to this day with Consent of Androw Elphinstoun' procurator
for the said Williame of forbes one that ane part And patrik Reid' one that vthir
is continewit to friday that nixt cumis the viij day of this Instant monetht
of maij in siclik strintht force and effect as It standis now with consent of partj
but preiudice till ony partie

The said day the Aldermane bailyeis with auis' of the counsaill Ratefeit and
appreuit the gift of xxtj s' giffin to thome chamer sangstar and assignit to be
pait be ser Williame couper quhilk Johnne fyff breukit obefor for this instant
yeir eftir the tenour of the Act maid' to the said thome tharapone obefor And
ordanit the said ser Williame nocht to be obeit of na proffitis of the said clerk
schip vnto the tyme the said clerkschip thomas be pait of the said xxtj s'

The said day the baillyeis assignit this day xv dais to thomas lammyntoun'
to ansuer to the borgh' fundin one hyme be Johnne Raburne for the wrang
uis' Raking and Intrometting fra hyme of ane weddir

The said day thome gledstane grantit hyme to pay to the wif of Willeame futhes
betuix this and friday nixt cumis at evin of the Rest of ane fow of caldronis xij s'

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem octauo die mensis maij
anno quo supra

The said' day William of murray was accusit for strubulance of Johne Cuk
sergeand' in the execucioun' of his office And' for the breking of common' ordinance
et cetera quhilkis the said' William denyit offering him redy tile vndirlie the decisioun'
of ane assis' And' in continent with Consent of the saide partiis the said' matir
was put to the decisioun' of thir personis Dauid menyeis Alexander Rede thomas leslie
William portar Dauid mar' Johne blak patry rede William Wormet thomas
Watson' Johne arthour Androw stevinsone Malcum crag Johne Ramsay Duncan
fyf Ande Johne craik burges of the siad' burghe quhilkis the gret aithez'
suorne the richtis resounis and allegaciounis witnes and preuis of batht the said partiis herd'
seyne and vndirstandin deliuerit ale in ane voce concordand' that thai coud' nocht acquit
the said' William of strubulance of the saide Johne Cuk officiar' for the quhilkis
he was in ane amerciament of the court and to amend' as law wile and forber' in tym'
to Cum Alsua the said' assis' ale in ane voce concordand' fande and deliuerit that
thai coud' nocht acquit the said' William of murray for brekin of common ordinance
for the quhilkis he was in ane Amerciament of the Court et cetera to amend' as law wile and
forber' in tym to Cum

head.add: acquitans Johannis crak et elene andirson' sponse sue

div.p:
The said' day Katherine laurence the Relict of vmquhile Dauid Crukschank alias
talyour and Johne Crukschank hir' Oy grauntit thame to haue resauit be the handis
of Elene Andirsone and Johne Craik hir' spous' threttene merkis and fyftene pennis
vsuale money of Scotland' In part of pament of the Some of tene pundis and x s'
les vsuale money aucht to the said' Johne Crukschank for his barnis part of gudis be deces' of his fadir and modir of the quhilkis thritten'
merkis and fyftene pennis thai dischargit the said' Elene and Johne Crak thar ayris executoris
and assignez nowe and foreuer for the the saide Johne and katherin thar ayris executoris and assignez
ande ale vthiris quhome It efferis

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene Tenta in pretorio eiusdem vndecimo
die mensis maij Anno quo supra et cetera

The said day Robert Walcar was conuict' be ane suorne assis' Dauid menyes
forspekar for tribulance of Johnne' gallouay for the quhilkis he was in ane
amerciament of the court and' to amend as law will and' forbeir in tyme
to cum And' the said Johnne quit of ale tribulance of him And' atour It
was ordanit be the said' assis' that the said Robert st sall stand' in
to the goiff vnto the tyme he be fred' be the mastir of the scuyll and'
the studentis of the samyne et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene Tenta in pretorio eiusdem decimo quinto die mensis Maij
Anno quo supra et cetera

The said day Schir Androue coupar and Alexander sclater oblist thame be the fathtis of thar
bodiis to stand' and' abid' at the ordinance and deliuerance of Androue cullan Richerd' Wricht
and Androue Wricht anent the metting of ane hous' pertenyng to the said' ser Androw quhilk
the said' Alexander Intrometit witht to do his labour according tharto the saidez personis chosin
be said partiis as arbitouris and' amicable compnitouris to decret and deliuer in the said'
matir And' the said' Alexander oblist him to bring the saidez personis witht him betuix this and'
the day viij dais and' quhat that thai deliuer tharintill that the said Alexander sale Reforme'
and' ples' the said' ser Androw according tharto

The said day Johnne fechat grantit him awand' to Johnne flessour v s' vj d' quhilkis the
bailyes chargit him to pay within terme of lawe

The said day berrehill be his avin toung graunt was in ane amerciament of the court
for the tribulance of Alexander sclatar and' to amend' as law will and' forbeir in tyme to cum

The said day berrehill was conuict be ane suorne assis' Dauid menyes forspekar
for tribulance of thome bell and' Dovny scot for the quhilkis he was in ane amerciament
of the court and' to amend' as law will and' forbeir in tyme to cum and' quhat tyme'
thar he tribulis thame his mastir Alexander sclatar or ony vthiris in tyme to cum to be banist
the tovne And' the said J thome and' Dovny quit of ale tribulance of the said' ber
rehill

The said day it was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' Dauid menyeis forspekar that the
borgh' fundin one Johnne litstar yongar wa be alane litstar for the wranguis' withthaldin
fra him of fifty s' was fundin awaile for the quhilkis the said' Johnne was in ane
amerciament of the court and' to amend' as law will and' forbeir in tyme to cum And' atour the
said alan litstar at command' of the said assis' forgef the said' Johnne' tene s' of the said'
fifty s' and' he to pay to the said alan fourty s' vsuale money of scotland' tharof tuenty
s' at mertimes nixt to cum and' vthir tuenty s' at Witsonday thareftir

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem decimo
octauo die mensis maij Anno quo supra et cetera

The said day the balyes assignit friday that nixt cummis to george heruy
to preiwe that Alexander thekar promittit to him that he suld' mak his
land' liand' in futy complet and' Sufficient betuix at the Rud day
that last was And' gif the said Alexander failyet that he suld' pay
the yeris maill quhilkis extendis to four merkis And' ordanit the said Alexander
to cum the said day to heir the said preuis suorne

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxijo
die mensis maij Anno quo supra

The said day Johnne arthour come souerte be his hand' that Alexander
thekar sale complet Sufficiently as efferis the hous' and' biging
pertenyng to georg heruy be the morn' at the sone gaing to
the said Alexander oblist him to freitht the said Johnne And'
atour the prouest and' bailyes ordanit and' chargit the said
Alexander be wertu of his condicioun' to prouid and get sufficient
tennendis till his hous' forsaid' for this yeir to cum And' fal
yeinge tharof to pay the maile of the said hous' to the said
george samekle as thai ar wortht for ane yeir

The said' day thir personis chosin and Suorne in ane assis' that Is to say Alexander Red'
Johne Colysone thomas leslie patry leslie Dauid mar' William Wormet Dauy stevart
malcome crag Johne blak Dauy blinsele Androw lousone Dauy Kintor patry Red'
Johne of Kintor declarit that thai coude nocht decid' the borghe' fundin one Johne
malysone be thomas lousone that the saide Johne aucht to mak him compt Rekning
and pament of ane barrele of Salmonde Resauit out of William bollis schip siclik as vthiris
wes sauld' in the rais' eftir the tenor of his bill et cetera for ony witnes producit befor thame
tharfor thai continevit the decisioun' of the saide borghe' to the hame cumyn' of William boll and
Robert moyses

The said' day It was ordanit and deliuerit be the prouest and Counsale ale in ane voce
concordand' that the ballieis sale pas' Ilkane in his quartar with his Officiar this day and
to morne befor novne to ale personis aving beir' and meile Siluere ande charge tham
to schew thame thar penny wortht quhilkis thai haue and wile sale for pament of the said' money
to the fremmit men' Ande ale that has nay pennyworthtis conuenient for thame
to charge and commavnd' to mak thankfule pament of ale Somes avinge be
thame to the said' Alienaris Certifeing ale the said' personis aving money that
has pennyworthtis that thai wile ger' pris' the samyn be Suorne personis and ale
that schevis nay pennyworthtis thai wile punde Compele and distrenye thame thar
gudis and mak Redy pament in pennis to the said' Alienaris of ale Somes aving
to thame for the tfrething' of the towne According to Justice

The xxv day of the monetht of maij the yer' of god' jM vC and sex yeris
It was statut and ordanit be the Aldirman balyeis and Counsale for the
escheing of the plage of pestlence and keping of the toune fra dangir
of ale strange Seknes that nay persone within this burghe' hous' herbrie
nor reset nay land' persone nor personis duelland' abevne petfodellis
vndir the pane of bannysing the toune and eschetis of ale thar gudis
to our' Souerane lorde Ande that the ballieis and the Officiaris sale warne
Circualie in thar' quartaris Sex mene and waik in the nicht and iiijor men'
in the day to keipe and wache the toune and stand and abid' in placis mast
conuenient for the kepin of the said' borghe

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxv die mensis maij
anno quo supra

The said' day the balyeis ordanit and chargit Dauy brois' to fulfil the condicioun'
maid' betuix him and Donald' baxtar anent the bying and Selling of half ane
land' within xxiiij houris or ellis resigne the said' half lande and discharge
him tharof / and tyne the franche crovne gif to the said Donald' in arlys

The said day the balyeis assignit friday that next cumis to patry leslie
yongar to preiwe the arras' bed his follouit be ane borghe fundin on'
thomas buchane

The said' day William murray grantit aving to Alexander burnat tene
s' scottis money to be pait within terme of law

The said day the balyeis assignit friday that next cumis to Dauy strabogy tile ansuer'
to the borghe' fundin one him be Robert gothtray anent the thekin of his hous'
et cetera

The said day It was statut ordanit and deliuerit be the prouest ballieis and Counsale
for amete vnite and Concord' to be hed' and Induring betuix Androw lousone one
that ane part and thome lammyntone one that vthir parte that gif ony of thame offendis
tile vthir and beis conuict tharof in tyme to Cum sale pay xl s' to Sanct
nicholes werk vnforgevin batht the said' partiis being oblist tharto be the
fathtis of thar bodiis

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem vicesimo sexto die
mensis maij anno quo supra

The said day Sywe sowtar is ane amerciament of the court for strublans
of Agnes andirson' be hir awyne toung grant vndir silens of nycht

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem vicesimo nono die mensis maij
anno quo supra

The said' day patry chernsid' follouit Androw stratone for xliij s' for the maile
of ane hous' Ande the said Androw allegit he had' pait the said' money to cristy
Prat And askit ane day to ger' cale the saide cristy to warand' him Ande the balyeis
assignit this day viij dais the fift day of June next to cum to the patry said androw to ger'
bring the cristy to Releiwe him the said' anent the pament of the said' maile and
falyeing' tharof to pay the Said' maile to the said' patry

The said day cristiane lilburne was conuict' be ane suorne assis' Johne Colison'
forspekar' for tribulance of Anny Andirsone for the quhilkis scho was in ane
amerciament of the court and to amend as law wile and forber' in tyme And the said
Anny was conuict be the said' assis' for tribulance of the said' cristiane for
the quhilk scho was in ane amerciament of the court and to Amend as law wile and forber'
in tyme to cum et cetera The said' cristiane was conuict' be the said' assis' for tribulance of mavy
movat And the said' mavy movat was conuict for strubulance of the said' cristiane
for the quhilkis Ilkane of thame was in ane Amerciament of the court and to Amend' as
law wile and forber' in tym' to Cum And' atour thai fand' the provocacioun' of the saide
tribulance in the said' cristiane

The said day it was ordanit be the aldirman and counsale that cristiane liburne
for the tribulance of Anny Andirsone and mawy movat committit be hir' that scho
sale syt done on hir kneis and ask the said Anny and mavy forgiwnes And scho
sale stand' in the tolbutht at the wile of the prouest and counsale Ande gif euere
scho trubulis the said' personis or ony vthir famous' honest persone In tym to cum
within this burghe and beis conuict tharof scho salbe bannyst and expellit out of this
toune

The said day It was fundin and deliuerit be ane assis' Johne Colison forspekar that thome
scottsman sale resaue clatht bocht fra gilbert litstar and pay him vij li'

The said' day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Johne colison' forspekar
that tiby cumin the spous' of Johne chamer sale haue hous' set to hir be Dauy blinsele
scho finding to him Sufficient Souerte for his maile

The said' day it was ordanit be the aldirman and counsale for the offence due to Anny
andirsone and mavy movat hir douchtir Syffy soutar salbe put in corbeis hoill
thar' to Reman vnto the tyme scho fynd' Souerte that the toune be skathtles of
hir' in tym' to Cum Ande gif euere scho dois ony tribulance tile ony persone In
tyme to Cum and beis conuict' tharof scho salbe bannyst the toune but ony process'

The said day the prouest ordanit Norman' leslie sergeand' to pas' and arrest the gudis
of Williame Rolland' for the maile aving be him do Dauy Colp tutor to Isabell
of buchane of the landis quhilkis he occupeit pertening to him as tutor forsaid'
The saide day Johne fechat grauntit him avand' to Johne Retre xvj s'

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio liberate eiusdem primo die mensis Junij anno quo
supra prope Cimiterium ecclesie parrochialis dicti burgi

The said' day Alexander malysone and patry malisone duelland' in strathtry was conuict'
be ane Suorne assis' thomas leslie forspekar for tribulance of the wache and'
keparis of the said' burghe for the quhilkis Ilkane of thame was in ane Amerciament of
the court and to Amend' as law wile and forber' in tym' to Cum

The said' day paule Wobstar be his avne toune graunt was in ane amerciament of the court for
brekin of commone ordinance in Resset of gudis that come fra Suspek placis within
the said' burghe' for the quhilkis he suld amende as law wile and forber' in tym'
to Cum

The said' day Duncan gilrutht Cristy Walcar' Alexander moir' Alexander Donaldsone and Walter
mernys was conuict' be ane Suorne assis' Dauy menyes forspekar for brekin of common'
ordinance in Resset of gudis within the said' burghe' that come out of Suspect placis
for the quhilkis Ilkan of thame was in ane Amerciament of the court and to Amend' as law will
and forber' in tyme to Cum
